metadata.name: State Of Delicacy
metadata.description:
Pure monochromatic bliss into the soft shapes of candid moments. The greatest memories are within the remarkable. 

When we almost can feel its touch, when our eyes collide on sparkles of good moments we're transported to the unique realm of nostalgia and imagination.

Shot all with Ilford Delta 3200 with the usual chemistry and smooth interaction between model and camera. Captured on distinct occasions between carefree afternoons with a Canon AE-1. 

Enjoy the ride to a great selection of sensuality, nostalgia and freedom. This project represents a great collaboration on the real power of film photography and the assertion of it as an artform.

A unique statement on the value of analog photography into the blockchain era.

35mm Ilford Delta 3200 / Canon AE-1
